channel.title: T1 on Ourkadai Technologies
channel.description: Recent content in T1 on Ourkadai Technologies

item.title: About Us
item.description:
OurKadai Technologies is a consortium of highly dedicated and passionate professionals with a focus on open-source software development. We strive to contribute meaningfully to the technology and the community through superior quality software solutions.

We specialize in designing and developing web applications with seamless integration, automation of business flows, and cost-effective e-business solutions with a focus on exceptional user experience through UI/UX.

Our resolute focus is on efficient, cost-effective, quality, and timely delivery of technology solutions for business challenges. Our team has rich and diverse experience in software development and project management, and we maintain stringent quality standards to ensure that we develop and deliver products and services of the highest degree that deliver the right value to our customers.

item.title: Clients
item.description:
Low Code/No Code

Aurzart

Made by musician for musician’ as the company slogan proudly pronounces, the whole ecommerce site is exclusively made, managed and operated day-in and day-out by a techno-novice music enthusiast, Martyn Charles, one of the early adopters of no-code platform.
This techno-romance is empowered by Technology and OurKadai enabled this melodious technology rendezvous, a reality. We baby stepped a non-techie musician to the world of no-code platforms, without spilling any silvers. Martyn is managing his ecommerce business all alone with incredible confidence without any kind of sustenance or support from any techies.
Aurzart stands tall as a corporeal illustration of our motto - ‘Trusted Technology Partnership’

item.title: Methodalogy
item.description:
The software industry is evolving rapidly, and keeping up with the changes can be challenging. Drawing from our two decades of experience in the field and our thoughtful observations, we have identified several significant developments that are shaping the industry. We have tailored our methodology to address these challenges head-on.

Technology is a Manager

In today’s technology-driven world, the concept of traditional management is becoming obsolete as technology can act as a manager. With automation and digitalization, tools such as continuous integration and project management tools take on management roles. This paradigm shift requires team members across various roles, including Business Analysts, Quality Analysts, and Project Managers, to have adequate technical expertise to effectively work with technology as their manager.

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Postgress Conference
All You Need to Work with SQL is Just SQL

Traditionally, we use Languages and Frameworks interact with Relational Databases. While these are effective in many ways, One problem is that, each of these brings new learning curve. It will be nice if we use SQL itself as the core skill and build application with plain simple SQL skills. In this webinar, I will demo this approach with a case study that builds simple, high performing Java application using Postgres database.

item.title: Training
item.description:
At OurKadai Technologies, we have a team of dedicated and experienced technology professionals with nearly two decades of experience in corporate training, recruitment, and talent scouting. Our core team consists of professionals who are part of Academic Advisory Boards and contribute to various technical forums & workshops. We are passionate about providing customized and interactive training programs that cater to the specific needs of today’s highly competitive tech industry.

Our training packages cover a wide range of topics that eliminate talent gaps and empower employees with the greatest IT skills, including the latest technology, niche tools/techniques, and industry-benchmarked quality systems. We focus on developing our trainees into a ready-on-day-one resource once they successfully complete our training programs. Our unique training programs are structured to cater to the explicit and distinctive needs of new employees and existing employees.
